Package core.sections.ParallelPort

Interface Summary
ParallelPortManagerObserver Observer interface for the Parallel Port Manager.
 

Class Summary
ExampleManager Deprecated.
ParallelPortConstructor Deprecated.
ParallelPortManager Basic Manager for the parallel port, must be extended so that the constructor of the new class configures the names and groups according to the specific needs of each connection and implementation of the system.
ParallelPortPinGroup Class for assigning a name to a group of bits and the methods to operate with numbers with that group instead of boolean values
ParallelPortState
